Message.name: Detonate
Message.Invoke:
(block ( (podType (objGetData gSource 'podType)) overlayID )
; Remove the radius overlay and add an armed radius
(enum (objGetOverlays gSource) oldOverlayID (if (= (objGetOverlayType gSource oldOverlayID) &HS_ovMiningPodRadius;) (objRemoveOverlay gSource oldOverlayID) ) )
(setq overlayID (objAddOverlay gSource &HS_ovMiningPodArmedRadius;)) (objSetOverlayProperty gSource overlayID 'counter (typGetStaticData podType 'effectRadius))
; Add a timer overlay to the pod
(setq overlayID (objAddOverlay gSource &HS_ovMiningPodTimer;)) (objSetOverlayData gSource overlayID 'sourceID (objGetData gSource 'ownerID)) (objSetOverlayData gSource overlayID 'startTime (unvGetTick)) (objSetOverlayData gSource overlayID 'podType podType)
; Armed
(objSetData gSource 'status 'armed) )

ItemType.name: seismic scanner pod
ItemType.description: This scanner pod emits a seismic wave that reveals the location of valuable resources in asteroids. It has a range of 30 light-seconds.

Events.OnEffect: (sysCreateWeaponFire &HS_vtSeismicScannerPower; (list (@ gData 'sourceObj) 'explosion Nil "seismic scanner pod" 0x00) (objGetPos (@ gData 'podObj)) 0 0 Nil (list 'detonateNow 'fireEffect 'soundEffect) )

ItemType.name: class A excavation pod
ItemType.description: Class A excavation pods uses a seismic charge to extract ore from asteroids in a 30 light-second radius. Excavation pods are most effective on metallic and volcanic asteroids.

Events.OnEffect: (sysCreateWeaponFire &HS_vtClassAExcavationPower; (list (@ gData 'sourceObj) 'explosion Nil "class A excavation pod" 0x00) (objGetPos (@ gData 'podObj)) 0 0 Nil (list 'detonateNow 'fireEffect 'soundEffect) )

ItemType.name: class B excavation pod
ItemType.description: This improved excavation pod has a 40 light-second radius. Excavation pods are most effective on metallic and volcanic asteroids.

Events.OnEffect: (sysCreateWeaponFire &HS_vtClassBExcavationPower; (list (@ gData 'sourceObj) 'explosion Nil "class B excavation pod" 0x00) (objGetPos (@ gData 'podObj)) 0 0 Nil (list 'detonateNow 'fireEffect 'soundEffect) )

ItemType.name: advanced scanner pod
ItemType.description: This is an improved version of the seismic scanner pod. It detects ore in a 60 light-second radius.

Events.OnEffect: (sysCreateWeaponFire &HS_vtAdvancedScannerPower; (list (@ gData 'sourceObj) 'explosion Nil "advanced scanner pod" 0x00) (objGetPos (@ gData 'podObj)) 0 0 Nil (list 'detonateNow 'fireEffect 'soundEffect) )

ItemType.name: class C excavation pod
ItemType.description: The class C uses a thermonuclear change and has a range of 60 light-seconds. Excavation pods are most effective on metallic and volcanic asteroids.

Events.OnEffect: (sysCreateWeaponFire &HS_vtClassCExcavationPower; (list (@ gData 'sourceObj) 'explosion Nil "class C excavation pod" 0x00) (objGetPos (@ gData 'podObj)) 0 0 Nil (list 'detonateNow 'fireEffect 'soundEffect) )

Events.OnUpdate:
(block ( (startTime (objGetOverlayData gSource aOverlayID 'startTime)) (detonateTime 150) (progress (subtract (unvGetTick) startTime)) (percentDone (if (gr detonateTime 0) (divide (multiply progress 100) detonateTime) 0)) (podType (objGetOverlayData gSource aOverlayID 'podType)) )
(switch ; If we're still ticking, set the counter
(ls progress detonateTime) (block Nil (objSetOverlayProperty gSource aOverlayID 'counter percentDone) (objSetOverlayProperty gSource aOverlayID 'counterLabel (typTranslate podType "msgWaiting")) )
; Boom!
(block Nil (typFireEvent podType 'OnEffect { sourceObj: (objGetObjByID (objGetOverlayData gSource aOverlayID 'sourceID)) podObj: gSource overlayID: aOverlayID })
; We get destroyed
(objRemove gSource) ) ) )

ItemType.name: (mining pod)
ItemType.Invoke:
(block ( (podType (itmGetType gItem)) (miningPodObj Nil) (overlayID Nil) )
; Create a mining pod
(setq miningPodObj (sysCreateStation &HS_stMiningPod; (objGetPos gSource))) (objSetName miningPodObj (itmGetName gItem 0x00) 0x00) (objIncVel miningPodObj (sysVectorPolarVelocity (objGetProperty gSource 'rotation) 5)) (objSetData miningPodObj 'ownerID (objGetID gSource)) (objSetData miningPodObj 'podType podType) (staSetImageVariant miningPodObj (typGetStaticData podType 'imageVariant))
; Add a radius overlay to indicate its area of effect
(setq overlayID (objAddOverlay miningPodObj &HS_ovMiningPodRadius;)) (objSetOverlayProperty miningPodObj overlayID 'counter (typGetStaticData (itmGetType gItem) 'effectRadius))
; Identify and consume the pod
(itmSetKnown gItem) (objRemoveItem gSource gItem 1) )
